SELECT si.id, si.store_product_id, si.store_product_desc_id, sd.name as store_product_issue, pi.name as product_name, p.price, si.qnt, si.disposal_date, p.exp, c.name as category_name, sp.store_id , p.cost FROM store_product_issue si INNER JOIN store_product_desc sd on sd. id = si.store_product_desc_id INNER JOIN store_product sp on sp.id = si.store_product_id INNER JOIN product p on p.id = sp.product_id INNER JOIN product_info pi on pi.product_code = p.product_info_id INNER JOIN category c on c.id = pi.category_id
